docs.lead_paragraph: ONLY a few months ago argument was rampant every where and friendships were being strained to the breaking point over the question of whether or not Daisy Ashford was a myth and sir James Barrie the real author of "The Young Visiters." headline.main: Daisy Ashford Writes Another Thriller; This Time She Tells How She Did It, While Irvin Cobb, Not Sir J.M. Barrie, Contributes a Brand-New Preface for Her
